20110130170739.000|20110130170741.000|CC1|THE COUNTRY IN THE NEXT TWO OR  
20110130170741.000|20110130170742.000|CC1|THREE MONTHS.                   
20110130170742.000|20110130170743.000|CC1|>> CONGRESSMAN SCHIFF, THERE WAS
20110130170743.000|20110130170747.000|CC1|A "NEW YORK TIMES" ARTICLE      
20110130170747.000|20110130170749.000|CC1|RECENTLY ABOUT A NOT VERY -- NOT

20110130171620.000|20110130171621.000|CC1|HAS BEEN SO HARMFUL TO THE

20110130171626.000|20110130171627.000|CC1|POINT OFF CAMERA THAT THERE'S

20110130171819.000|20110130172002.000|SEG_01|Type=Commercial
20110130171819.000|20110130171820.000|CC1|    Lysol believes that kids    
20110130171820.000|20110130171822.000|CC1|   shouldn't miss school days   
20110130171822.000|20110130171825.000|CC1|   during cold and flu season.  
20110130171825.000|20110130171825.000|CC1|      That's why we started     
20110130171825.000|20110130171827.000|CC1|      a mission for health.     
20110130171827.000|20110130171827.000|CC1|         By going beyond        
20110130171827.000|20110130171829.000|CC1|         clean surfaces         
20110130171829.000|20110130171832.000|CC1|      to healthy surfaces.      
20110130171832.000|20110130171832.000|CC1|     By making a healthy way    
20110130171832.000|20110130171835.000|CC1|         to wash hands.         
20110130171835.000|20110130171835.000|CC1|       And even by working      
20110130171835.000|20110130171837.000|CC1|       with a pediatrician      
20110130171837.000|20110130171837.000|CC1|    to develop Lysol healthy    
20110130171837.000|20110130171841.000|CC1| habits initiatives in schools. 
20110130171841.000|20110130171843.000|CC1|       When you use Lysol,      
20110130171843.000|20110130171843.000|CC1|        you're a part of        
20110130171843.000|20110130171844.000|CC1|        something bigger.

20110130172450.000|20110130172450.000|CC1|THE FACTORY?                    
20110130172450.000|20110130172452.000|CC1|>> THAT'S A GREAT QUESTION      
20110130172452.000|20110130172454.000|CC1|BECAUSE ABSOLUTELY IT DOES      
20110130172454.000|20110130172454.000|CC1|EXIST.                          
20110130172454.000|20110130172456.000|CC1|SADLY IT DIDN'T EXIST IN MANY   
20110130172456.000|20110130172457.000|CC1|PROMINENT CASES LIKE ENRON,     
20110130172457.000|20110130172459.000|CC1|LIKE, FOR EXAMPLE, EVEN THE     
20110130172459.000|20110130172501.000|CC1|COUNTRYWIDE MORTGAGE MELTDOWN.  
20110130172501.000|20110130172502.000|CC1|I KNOW YOUR PREVIOUS GUEST WAS  
20110130172502.000|20110130172504.000|CC1|TALKING ABOUT THE HOUSING       
20110130172504.000|20110130172504.000|CC1|CRISIS.                         
20110130172504.000|20110130172506.000|CC1|IT DIDN'T HAPPEN ON DEEPWATER   
20110130172506.000|20110130172508.000|CC1|HORIZON, BUT IT DOES HAPPEN IN  
20110130172508.000|20110130172508.000|CC1|MANY ORGANIZATIONS.             
20110130172508.000|20110130172510.000|CC1|IN FACT, I WOULD ARGUE MANY OF  
20110130172510.000|20110130172511.000|CC1|THE MOST SUCCESSFUL

20110130172514.000|20110130172516.000|CC1|KNOW, YOU HAVE THE STARBUCKS,

20110130172525.000|20110130172526.000|CC1|BUSINESSES THAT DON'T GET IT

20110130172532.000|20110130172532.000|CC1|BUSINESS?                       
20110130172532.000|20110130172539.000|CC1|>> THE PURPOSE OF BUSINESS IS --
20110130172539.000|20110130172540.000|CC1|THE REAL PURPOSE OF BUSINESS IS 
20110130172540.000|20110130172544.000|CC1|TO SERVE THE NEEDS -- IDENTIFY  
20110130172544.000|20110130172545.000|CC1|AND SERVE THE NEEDS OF PEOPLE,  
20110130172545.000|20110130172547.000|CC1|THAT THAT'S THE ONLY LEGITIMATE 
20110130172547.000|20110130172548.000|CC1|PURPOSE OF BUSINESS, SERVING THE

20110130172549.000|20110130172550.000|CC1|>> THEY WOULD ARGUE THOUGH THAT 
20110130172550.000|20110130172552.000|CC1|EVEN IF YOU'RE OUT TO MAKE A

20110130172751.000|20110130172751.000|CC1|    SEVEN YEARS AGO,

20110130172804.000|20110130172804.000|CC1|        TO FURTHER              
20110130172804.000|20110130172806.000|CC1|    THOSE CONNECTIONS.          
20110130172806.000|20110130172806.000|CC1|    LAST YEAR WE TOOK
